mapper.select: select EMP.EMP_SEQ AS EMP_SEQ, EMP.EMP_NM AS EMPL_NM, PLACE.PLACE_NM AS PLACE_NM, DUTY.DUTY_NM AS DUTY_NM, RANK.RANK_NM AS RANK_NM, AUTH.AUTH_DESC AS AUTH_NM FROM WEB_EMPL_MGM EMP INNER JOIN WEB_PLACE_MGM PLACE ON EMP.PLACE_SEQ = PLACE.PLACE_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_DUTY_MGM DUTY ON EMP.DUTY_SEQ = DUTY.DUTY_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_RANK_MGM RANK ON EMP.RANK_SEQ = RANK.RANK_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_AUTHOR_GRP AUTH ON EMP.AUTH_SEQ = AUTH.AUTH_SEQ
SELECT DUTY_SEQ AS DUTYLIST_SEQ, DUTY_NM AS DUTY_LIST FROM WEB_DUTY_MGM WHERE DUTY_NM != '대표이사'
SELECT RANK_SEQ AS RANKLIST_SEQ, RANK_NM AS RANK_LIST FROM WEB_RANK_MGM WHERE RANK_NM != '대표' ORDER BY RANK_SEQ DESC
SELECT PLACE_SEQ AS PLACELIST_SEQ, PLACE_NM AS PLACE_LIST FROM WEB_PLACE_MGM
SELECT AUTH_SEQ AS AUTHLIST_SEQ, AUTH_DESC AS AUTH_LIST FROM WEB_AUTHOR_GRP ORDER BY AUTH_SEQ DESC

select emp.emp_Seq as empSeq,emp.emp_nm as empl_nm, duty.duty_nm as duty_nm, rank.rank_nm as rank_nm ,auth.auth_nm as auth_nm,place.place_nm as place_nm,email,tel,to_char(join_dt,'yyyy/mm/dd') as join_Dt ,emp.duty_seq as dutylistSeq,emp.rank_seq as ranklistSeq, emp.auth_seq as authlistSeq,emp.place_seq as placelistSeq from web_empl_mgm emp inner join web_duty_mgm duty on emp.duty_Seq = duty.duty_seq inner join web_rank_mgm rank on emp.rank_seq = rank.rank_seq inner join web_author_grp auth on emp.auth_seq = AUTH.AUTH_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_PLACE_MGM PLACE ON EMP.PLACE_SEQ = PLACE.PLACE_SEQ
WHERE EMP.EMP_SEQ = ${empSeq}
mapper.update: update web_empl_mgm set emp_nm = #{emplNm}, duty_seq = #{dutylistSeq}, rank_seq = #{ranklistSeq}, auth_seq = #{authlistSeq}, place_seq = #{placelistSeq}, email= #{email}, tel = #{tel} where emp_seq = ${empSeq}
